summary: A collection of high‑level Python wrappers around the GDAL/OGR C library that expose drivers, data sources, layers, features, fields, geometries, envelopes, spatial reference systems and error handling as Pythonic objects, enabling seamless interaction with vector geospatial data in Django.
business_intent: Allow Django applications to read, write, query, transform and manage spatial data using GDAL/OGR without dealing with low‑level C APIs, thereby simplifying the development of GIS‑enabled web services and analytics.
